div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1045 Kobuleti environs, Adzhar ASSR, Georgia, 1952 Burial: before 325 B.C. (Golenko, Kapa- nadze) Contents: 1 EL, 291 AR. In bronze vase with 3 electrum earrings Colchis: 291 hemidr. Cyzicus: 1 st. (as von Fritze 121) Disposition: Tiflis Pakhomov VIII, 1898 â€ Golenko-Kapanadze, NE 6 (1966), pp. 31-61
